title: Match maker differences
body:
Wow I wish the game was more lvl balanced.....
It is such joy being a lvl 6 with a team full of 6-7 vs a team of 11's that is so balanced.....
GG MM GG

replies.body:
Yeahhhh, hardly sounds significant - you're all still in the first stages of the game with hardly any differences in power or experience. The game's full of smurfs anyway, so chances are you will or will have encountered a few of those as well. I often got matched up with 30s, or had situations where I'm fighting 30s but I've got smurfs on my team. 

TLDR: The situation you have described can hardly be considered dire.
You're complaining about a difference of 5 levels? I can only assume this is your first account.
